about.title: About Me
about.description: I, m a designer & developer with a passion for web design. I enjoy developing simple, clean and slick websites that provide real value to the end user. Thousands of clients have procured exceptional resulfs while working with me. Delivering work within time and budget which meets clients requirements in our mata.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Here are some of my recent projects that showcase my skills and expertise.

items.name: Agency
items.description: A modern digital agency website featuring service offerings, client portfolios, and contact solutions designed to attract new business opportunities.

items.name: Crypto App
items.description: A cryptocurrency tracking application with real-time price data, portfolio management, and market trend visualization tools for crypto enthusiasts.

items.name: Real Estate
items.description: A comprehensive real estate platform showcasing property listings with advanced search filters, virtual tours, and agent contact capabilities.

items.name: Job Tracking
items.description: A job application management system that helps users organize their job search, track applications, and monitor interview progress.
